comments.creator: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.author: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
From #glean on Matrix:

> The send() of custom ping is going to be deprecated. According to the comments, it suggest us to use [submit() instead](https://github.com/mozilla/glean/blob/master/glean-core/android/src/main/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/private/PingType.kt#L75) However, when using Java, I can't call it without parameters, I have to give a null, does it what you want us to do?

The fix here is to add a `@JvmOverloads` annotation to the method and add test coverage for it in [here](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/774da57f823b57c4cc70aae72479e03b7ba10801/glean-core/android/src/test/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/GleanFromJavaTest.java).
comments.text:
From #glean on Matrix:

> The send() of custom ping is going to be deprecated. According to the comments, it suggest us to use [submit() instead](https://github.com/mozilla/glean/blob/master/glean-core/android/src/main/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/private/PingType.kt#L75) However, when using Java, I can't call it without parameters, I have to give a null, does it what you want us to do?

The fix here is to add a `@JvmOverloads` annotation to the method and add test coverage for it in [here](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/774da57f823b57c4cc70aae72479e03b7ba10801/glean-core/android/src/test/java/mozilla/telemetry/glean/GleanFromJavaTest.java).

comments.raw_text: Note: this will probably require a change in Android Components as well after a new glean release is cut.
